<script>(function(window){
	var evCache = {};
	window.So = {
		'comm': {
			'wide': false
		}
	};
	window.PageLine = {
		on: function(ev, callback) {
			if (ev && callback && typeof ev === 'string' && typeof callback === 'function') {
				if (!evCache[ev]) {
					evCache[ev] = [];
				}
				evCache[ev].push(callback);
			}
		},
		trigger: function(ev) {
			if (ev && typeof ev === 'string' && evCache[ev]) {
				for (var i = evCache[ev].length; i--;) {
					evCache[ev][i]();
				}
			}
		}
	};

	var documentELement = document.documentElement,
	wrap = document.getElementById("warper"),
	setClass = function() {
		if (documentELement.clientWidth > 1140) {
			So.comm.wide = true;
			wrap.className.indexOf("so-w1330") < 0 && (wrap.className += " so-w1330");
		} else {
			So.comm.wide = false;
			wrap.className = wrap.className.replace("so-w1330", "");
		}
		window.PageLine.trigger('resize');
	},
	timer,
	checkSize = function() {
		timer && clearTimeout(timer);
		timer = setTimeout(function() {
			setClass();
		}, 100);
	};
	setClass();
	if (window.addEventListener) {
		window.addEventListener('resize', checkSize);
	} else {
		window.attachEvent('onresize', checkSize);
	}

})(window);</script>

<script>;(function(){
			setTimeout(function(){
				var side = document.getElementById('side'),
					target = findEle(side, 'to_haosou'),
					span = target && target.getElementsByTagName('span')[0],
					a = span && span.parentNode,
					href = a.href;
				a.href = href.replace(/src=.*&/,'src=news_srp_rightside&');
				span && (span.innerHTML = cutStr(span.innerHTML, 16, '...'));
			},100);

			function findEle(ele, className){
				var children = ele && ele.children,
					len = children && children.length - 1,
					ele = null;
				while(len >= 0){
					ele = children[len--];ele.className;
					if(ele.className == className){
						return ele;
					}
				}
			}
			function cutStr(str, max, instead){
				var i = 0,
					len = 0,
					num = 0;
				str = str.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,'');
				for(len = str.length; i < len;){
					str.charCodeAt(i++) < 128 ? num += 1 : num += 2;
					if(num > max){
						return str.substring(0, i) + instead;
					}
				}
				return str;
			}
	})();</script>

<script>_loader.use("jquery",function(){function f(){$(".mh-less",s).each(function(){var e=$(this),t=e.closest(".mh-box"),n=t.find(".mh-bd");e.removeClass("mh-less"),n.height(t.data("line").i*c())})}function l(){return So.comm.wide}function c(){return 114}var e="4",t="3",n="4",r=e*n,i=t*n,s=$("#mohe-know_side_nlp-imagelist"),o=$(".mh-box",s),u=null;try{$(".js-imglist-img",s).error(function(){$(this).attr("src","http://p8.qhimg.com/dmsmty/74_74_80/t0103d5b18ff1ad8d7e.png").unbind("error")})}catch(a){}window.PageLine&&PageLine.on&&(PageLine.on("resize",function(){if(u&&new Date*1-u<600)return;f(),$(".mh-box",s).each(function(e,t){var n=$(this),r=n.find(".mh-op-fold"),i=n.find(".mh-bd"),s=n.data("line"),o=s.i,u=l()?s.k:s.z,a=c();u>o?(r.show(),i.height(a*o)):(r.hide(),i.height(a*u))})}),PageLine.trigger("resize")),s.on("click",".mh-op-fold",function(e){e.preventDefault();var t=l();u=new Date*1;var s=$(this),o=s.closest(".mh-box"),a=o.find(".mh-bd"),h=o.data("line"),p=h.i,d=t?h.k:h.z,v=c();if(s.hasClass("mh-less"))a.height(d>p?p*v:v);else{f();var m=a.find(".js-imglist-img").not("[data-src]"),g=a.find(".js-imglist-img[data-src]"),y=t?r:i,b=y-m.length;b>0&&g.length&&g.each(function(e,t){if(e+1>b)return;var n=$(this);n.attr("src",n.data("src")).removeAttr("data-src")}),a.height(v*Math.min(d,n))}s.toggleClass("mh-less")}).on("click",".js-showall",function(t){s.find(".mh-box-hide").each(function(t,n){var r=$(n),i=r.data("line").i*e-1;r.find(".js-imglist-img").each(function(e,t){if(e>i)return;var n=$(this);n.attr("src",n.data("src")).removeAttr("data-src")}),r.removeClass("mh-box-hide")}),$(this).remove()});var h="0",p="2",d=[];for(var v=h;v<p;v++)d.push("tag"+v);var m=$.parseJSON($.trim($(".js-mh-versions",s).val()));window.PageLine&&PageLine.fill&&PageLine.fill({cat:"know_side_nlp-moni-imagelist","md-nlp-v":m.join("|"),"md-nlp-i":d.join("|")})})</script></div><script>window.PageLine&&PageLine.fill&&PageLine.fill({cat:"know_side_nlp-moni"})</script>

<script>(function(window){
	var evCache = {};
	window.So = {
		'comm': {
			'wide': false
		}
	};
	window.PageLine = {
		on: function(ev, callback) {
			if (ev && callback && typeof ev === 'string' && typeof callback === 'function') {
				if (!evCache[ev]) {
					evCache[ev] = [];
				}
				evCache[ev].push(callback);
			}
		},
		trigger: function(ev) {
			if (ev && typeof ev === 'string' && evCache[ev]) {
				for (var i = evCache[ev].length; i--;) {
					evCache[ev][i]();
				}
			}
		}
	};

	var documentELement = document.documentElement,
	wrap = document.getElementById("warper"),
	setClass = function() {
		if (documentELement.clientWidth > 1140) {
			So.comm.wide = true;
			wrap.className.indexOf("so-w1330") < 0 && (wrap.className += " so-w1330");
		} else {
			So.comm.wide = false;
			wrap.className = wrap.className.replace("so-w1330", "");
		}
		window.PageLine.trigger('resize');
	},
	timer,
	checkSize = function() {
		timer && clearTimeout(timer);
		timer = setTimeout(function() {
			setClass();
		}, 100);
	};
	setClass();
	if (window.addEventListener) {
		window.addEventListener('resize', checkSize);
	} else {
		window.attachEvent('onresize', checkSize);
	}

})(window);</script>

</section>
<script>;(function(){
			setTimeout(function(){
				var side = document.getElementById('side'),
					target = findEle(side, 'to_haosou'),
					span = target && target.getElementsByTagName('span')[0],
					a = span && span.parentNode,
					href = a.href;
				a.href = href.replace(/src=.*&/,'src=news_srp_rightside&');
				span && (span.innerHTML = cutStr(span.innerHTML, 16, '...'));
			},100);

			function findEle(ele, className){
				var children = ele && ele.children,
					len = children && children.length - 1,
					ele = null;
				while(len >= 0){
					ele = children[len--];ele.className;
					if(ele.className == className){
						return ele;
					}
				}
			}
			function cutStr(str, max, instead){
				var i = 0,
					len = 0,
					num = 0;
				str = str.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,'');
				for(len = str.length; i < len;){
					str.charCodeAt(i++) < 128 ? num += 1 : num += 2;
					if(num > max){
						return str.substring(0, i) + instead;
					}
				}
				return str;
			}
	})();</script>

<div id="warper" class="">
<div id="container">
<script>(function(window){
	var evCache = {};
	window.So = {
		'comm': {
			'wide': false
		}
	};
	window.PageLine = {
		on: function(ev, callback) {
			if (ev && callback && typeof ev === 'string' && typeof callback === 'function') {
				if (!evCache[ev]) {
					evCache[ev] = [];
				}
				evCache[ev].push(callback);
			}
		},
		trigger: function(ev) {
			if (ev && typeof ev === 'string' && evCache[ev]) {
				for (var i = evCache[ev].length; i--;) {
					evCache[ev][i]();
				}
			}
		}
	};

	var documentELement = document.documentElement,
	wrap = document.getElementById("warper"),
	setClass = function() {
		if (documentELement.clientWidth > 1140) {
			So.comm.wide = true;
			wrap.className.indexOf("so-w1330") < 0 && (wrap.className += " so-w1330");
		} else {
			So.comm.wide = false;
			wrap.className = wrap.className.replace("so-w1330", "");
		}
		window.PageLine.trigger('resize');
	},
	timer,
	checkSize = function() {
		timer && clearTimeout(timer);
		timer = setTimeout(function() {
			setClass();
		}, 100);
	};
	setClass();
	if (window.addEventListener) {
		window.addEventListener('resize', checkSize);
	} else {
		window.attachEvent('onresize', checkSize);
	}

})(window);</script>

<script>;(function(){
			setTimeout(function(){
				var side = document.getElementById('side'),
					target = findEle(side, 'to_haosou'),
					span = target && target.getElementsByTagName('span')[0],
					a = span && span.parentNode,
					href = a.href;
				a.href = href.replace(/src=.*&/,'src=news_srp_rightside&');
				span && (span.innerHTML = cutStr(span.innerHTML, 16, '...'));
			},100);

			function findEle(ele, className){
				var children = ele && ele.children,
					len = children && children.length - 1,
					ele = null;
				while(len >= 0){
					ele = children[len--];ele.className;
					if(ele.className == className){
						return ele;
					}
				}
			}
			function cutStr(str, max, instead){
				var i = 0,
					len = 0,
					num = 0;
				str = str.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,'');
				for(len = str.length; i < len;){
					str.charCodeAt(i++) < 128 ? num += 1 : num += 2;
					if(num > max){
						return str.substring(0, i) + instead;
					}
				}
				return str;
			}
	})();</script>

<div id="container">
<script>(function(window){
	var evCache = {};
	window.So = {
		'comm': {
			'wide': false
		}
	};
	window.PageLine = {
		on: function(ev, callback) {
			if (ev && callback && typeof ev === 'string' && typeof callback === 'function') {
				if (!evCache[ev]) {
					evCache[ev] = [];
				}
				evCache[ev].push(callback);
			}
		},
		trigger: function(ev) {
			if (ev && typeof ev === 'string' && evCache[ev]) {
				for (var i = evCache[ev].length; i--;) {
					evCache[ev][i]();
				}
			}
		}
	};

	var documentELement = document.documentElement,
	wrap = document.getElementById("warper"),
	setClass = function() {
		if (documentELement.clientWidth > 1140) {
			So.comm.wide = true;
			wrap.className.indexOf("so-w1330") < 0 && (wrap.className += " so-w1330");
		} else {
			So.comm.wide = false;
			wrap.className = wrap.className.replace("so-w1330", "");
		}
		window.PageLine.trigger('resize');
	},
	timer,
	checkSize = function() {
		timer && clearTimeout(timer);
		timer = setTimeout(function() {
			setClass();
		}, 100);
	};
	setClass();
	if (window.addEventListener) {
		window.addEventListener('resize', checkSize);
	} else {
		window.attachEvent('onresize', checkSize);
	}

})(window);</script>

<script>;(function(){
			setTimeout(function(){
				var side = document.getElementById('side'),
					target = findEle(side, 'to_haosou'),
					span = target && target.getElementsByTagName('span')[0],
					a = span && span.parentNode,
					href = a.href;
				a.href = href.replace(/src=.*&/,'src=news_srp_rightside&');
				span && (span.innerHTML = cutStr(span.innerHTML, 16, '...'));
			},100);

			function findEle(ele, className){
				var children = ele && ele.children,
					len = children && children.length - 1,
					ele = null;
				while(len >= 0){
					ele = children[len--];ele.className;
					if(ele.className == className){
						return ele;
					}
				}
			}
			function cutStr(str, max, instead){
				var i = 0,
					len = 0,
					num = 0;
				str = str.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,'');
				for(len = str.length; i < len;){
					str.charCodeAt(i++) < 128 ? num += 1 : num += 2;
					if(num > max){
						return str.substring(0, i) + instead;
					}
				}
				return str;
			}
	})();</script>

<script>(function(window){
	var evCache = {};
	window.So = {
		'comm': {
			'wide': false
		}
	};
	window.PageLine = {
		on: function(ev, callback) {
			if (ev && callback && typeof ev === 'string' && typeof callback === 'function') {
				if (!evCache[ev]) {
					evCache[ev] = [];
				}
				evCache[ev].push(callback);
			}
		},
		trigger: function(ev) {
			if (ev && typeof ev === 'string' && evCache[ev]) {
				for (var i = evCache[ev].length; i--;) {
					evCache[ev][i]();
				}
			}
		}
	};

	var documentELement = document.documentElement,
	wrap = document.getElementById("warper"),
	setClass = function() {
		if (documentELement.clientWidth > 1140) {
			So.comm.wide = true;
			wrap.className.indexOf("so-w1330") < 0 && (wrap.className += " so-w1330");
		} else {
			So.comm.wide = false;
			wrap.className = wrap.className.replace("so-w1330", "");
		}
		window.PageLine.trigger('resize');
	},
	timer,
	checkSize = function() {
		timer && clearTimeout(timer);
		timer = setTimeout(function() {
			setClass();
		}, 100);
	};
	setClass();
	if (window.addEventListener) {
		window.addEventListener('resize', checkSize);
	} else {
		window.attachEvent('onresize', checkSize);
	}

})(window);</script>

<script>;(function(){
			setTimeout(function(){
				var side = document.getElementById('side'),
					target = findEle(side, 'to_haosou'),
					span = target && target.getElementsByTagName('span')[0],
					a = span && span.parentNode,
					href = a.href;
				a.href = href.replace(/src=.*&/,'src=news_srp_rightside&');
				span && (span.innerHTML = cutStr(span.innerHTML, 16, '...'));
			},100);

			function findEle(ele, className){
				var children = ele && ele.children,
					len = children && children.length - 1,
					ele = null;
				while(len >= 0){
					ele = children[len--];ele.className;
					if(ele.className == className){
						return ele;
					}
				}
			}
			function cutStr(str, max, instead){
				var i = 0,
					len = 0,
					num = 0;
				str = str.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,'');
				for(len = str.length; i < len;){
					str.charCodeAt(i++) < 128 ? num += 1 : num += 2;
					if(num > max){
						return str.substring(0, i) + instead;
					}
				}
				return str;
			}
	})();</script>

<script>_loader.use("jquery",function(){function f(){$(".mh-less",s).each(function(){var e=$(this),t=e.closest(".mh-box"),n=t.find(".mh-bd");e.removeClass("mh-less"),n.height(t.data("line").i*c())})}function l(){return So.comm.wide}function c(){return 114}var e="4",t="3",n="4",r=e*n,i=t*n,s=$("#mohe-know_side_nlp-imagelist"),o=$(".mh-box",s),u=null;try{$(".js-imglist-img",s).error(function(){$(this).attr("src","http://p8.qhimg.com/dmsmty/74_74_80/t0103d5b18ff1ad8d7e.png").unbind("error")})}catch(a){}window.PageLine&&PageLine.on&&(PageLine.on("resize",function(){if(u&&new Date*1-u<600)return;f(),$(".mh-box",s).each(function(e,t){var n=$(this),r=n.find(".mh-op-fold"),i=n.find(".mh-bd"),s=n.data("line"),o=s.i,u=l()?s.k:s.z,a=c();u>o?(r.show(),i.height(a*o)):(r.hide(),i.height(a*u))})}),PageLine.trigger("resize")),s.on("click",".mh-op-fold",function(e){e.preventDefault();var t=l();u=new Date*1;var s=$(this),o=s.closest(".mh-box"),a=o.find(".mh-bd"),h=o.data("line"),p=h.i,d=t?h.k:h.z,v=c();if(s.hasClass("mh-less"))a.height(d>p?p*v:v);else{f();var m=a.find(".js-imglist-img").not("[data-src]"),g=a.find(".js-imglist-img[data-src]"),y=t?r:i,b=y-m.length;b>0&&g.length&&g.each(function(e,t){if(e+1>b)return;var n=$(this);n.attr("src",n.data("src")).removeAttr("data-src")}),a.height(v*Math.min(d,n))}s.toggleClass("mh-less")}).on("click",".js-showall",function(t){s.find(".mh-box-hide").each(function(t,n){var r=$(n),i=r.data("line").i*e-1;r.find(".js-imglist-img").each(function(e,t){if(e>i)return;var n=$(this);n.attr("src",n.data("src")).removeAttr("data-src")}),r.removeClass("mh-box-hide")}),$(this).remove()});var h="0",p="2",d=[];for(var v=h;v<p;v++)d.push("tag"+v);var m=$.parseJSON($.trim($(".js-mh-versions",s).val()));window.PageLine&&PageLine.fill&&PageLine.fill({cat:"know_side_nlp-moni-imagelist","md-nlp-v":m.join("|"),"md-nlp-i":d.join("|")})})</script></div><script>window.PageLine&&PageLine.fill&&PageLine.fill({cat:"know_side_nlp-moni"})</script>

<script>(function(window){
	var evCache = {};
	window.So = {
		'comm': {
			'wide': false
		}
	};
	window.PageLine = {
		on: function(ev, callback) {
			if (ev && callback && typeof ev === 'string' && typeof callback === 'function') {
				if (!evCache[ev]) {
					evCache[ev] = [];
				}
				evCache[ev].push(callback);
			}
		},
		trigger: function(ev) {
			if (ev && typeof ev === 'string' && evCache[ev]) {
				for (var i = evCache[ev].length; i--;) {
					evCache[ev][i]();
				}
			}
		}
	};

	var documentELement = document.documentElement,
	wrap = document.getElementById("warper"),
	setClass = function() {
		if (documentELement.clientWidth > 1140) {
			So.comm.wide = true;
			wrap.className.indexOf("so-w1330") < 0 && (wrap.className += " so-w1330");
		} else {
			So.comm.wide = false;
			wrap.className = wrap.className.replace("so-w1330", "");
		}
		window.PageLine.trigger('resize');
	},
	timer,
	checkSize = function() {
		timer && clearTimeout(timer);
		timer = setTimeout(function() {
			setClass();
		}, 100);
	};
	setClass();
	if (window.addEventListener) {
		window.addEventListener('resize', checkSize);
	} else {
		window.attachEvent('onresize', checkSize);
	}

})(window);</script>

<script>;(function(){
			setTimeout(function(){
				var side = document.getElementById('side'),
					target = findEle(side, 'to_haosou'),
					span = target && target.getElementsByTagName('span')[0],
					a = span && span.parentNode,
					href = a.href;
				a.href = href.replace(/src=.*&/,'src=news_srp_rightside&');
				span && (span.innerHTML = cutStr(span.innerHTML, 16, '...'));
			},100);

			function findEle(ele, className){
				var children = ele && ele.children,
					len = children && children.length - 1,
					ele = null;
				while(len >= 0){
					ele = children[len--];ele.className;
					if(ele.className == className){
						return ele;
					}
				}
			}
			function cutStr(str, max, instead){
				var i = 0,
					len = 0,
					num = 0;
				str = str.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,'');
				for(len = str.length; i < len;){
					str.charCodeAt(i++) < 128 ? num += 1 : num += 2;
					if(num > max){
						return str.substring(0, i) + instead;
					}
				}
				return str;
			}
	})();</script>

<script>_loader.use("jquery",function(){function f(){$(".mh-less",s).each(function(){var e=$(this),t=e.closest(".mh-box"),n=t.find(".mh-bd");e.removeClass("mh-less"),n.height(t.data("line").i*c())})}function l(){return So.comm.wide}function c(){return 114}var e="4",t="3",n="4",r=e*n,i=t*n,s=$("#mohe-know_side_nlp-imagelist"),o=$(".mh-box",s),u=null;try{$(".js-imglist-img",s).error(function(){$(this).attr("src","http://p8.qhimg.com/dmsmty/74_74_80/t0103d5b18ff1ad8d7e.png").unbind("error")})}catch(a){}window.PageLine&&PageLine.on&&(PageLine.on("resize",function(){if(u&&new Date*1-u<600)return;f(),$(".mh-box",s).each(function(e,t){var n=$(this),r=n.find(".mh-op-fold"),i=n.find(".mh-bd"),s=n.data("line"),o=s.i,u=l()?s.k:s.z,a=c();u>o?(r.show(),i.height(a*o)):(r.hide(),i.height(a*u))})}),PageLine.trigger("resize")),s.on("click",".mh-op-fold",function(e){e.preventDefault();var t=l();u=new Date*1;var s=$(this),o=s.closest(".mh-box"),a=o.find(".mh-bd"),h=o.data("line"),p=h.i,d=t?h.k:h.z,v=c();if(s.hasClass("mh-less"))a.height(d>p?p*v:v);else{f();var m=a.find(".js-imglist-img").not("[data-src]"),g=a.find(".js-imglist-img[data-src]"),y=t?r:i,b=y-m.length;b>0&&g.length&&g.each(function(e,t){if(e+1>b)return;var n=$(this);n.attr("src",n.data("src")).removeAttr("data-src")}),a.height(v*Math.min(d,n))}s.toggleClass("mh-less")}).on("click",".js-showall",function(t){s.find(".mh-box-hide").each(function(t,n){var r=$(n),i=r.data("line").i*e-1;r.find(".js-imglist-img").each(function(e,t){if(e>i)return;var n=$(this);n.attr("src",n.data("src")).removeAttr("data-src")}),r.removeClass("mh-box-hide")}),$(this).remove()});var h="0",p="2",d=[];for(var v=h;v<p;v++)d.push("tag"+v);var m=$.parseJSON($.trim($(".js-mh-versions",s).val()));window.PageLine&&PageLine.fill&&PageLine.fill({cat:"know_side_nlp-moni-imagelist","md-nlp-v":m.join("|"),"md-nlp-i":d.join("|")})})</script></div><script>window.PageLine&&PageLine.fill&&PageLine.fill({cat:"know_side_nlp-moni"})</script>

<script>(function(window){
	var evCache = {};
	window.So = {
		'comm': {
			'wide': false
		}
	};
	window.PageLine = {
		on: function(ev, callback) {
			if (ev && callback && typeof ev === 'string' && typeof callback === 'function') {
				if (!evCache[ev]) {
					evCache[ev] = [];
				}
				evCache[ev].push(callback);
			}
		},
		trigger: function(ev) {
			if (ev && typeof ev === 'string' && evCache[ev]) {
				for (var i = evCache[ev].length; i--;) {
					evCache[ev][i]();
				}
			}
		}
	};

	var documentELement = document.documentElement,
	wrap = document.getElementById("warper"),
	setClass = function() {
		if (documentELement.clientWidth > 1140) {
			So.comm.wide = true;
			wrap.className.indexOf("so-w1330") < 0 && (wrap.className += " so-w1330");
		} else {
			So.comm.wide = false;
			wrap.className = wrap.className.replace("so-w1330", "");
		}
		window.PageLine.trigger('resize');
	},
	timer,
	checkSize = function() {
		timer && clearTimeout(timer);
		timer = setTimeout(function() {
			setClass();
		}, 100);
	};
	setClass();
	if (window.addEventListener) {
		window.addEventListener('resize', checkSize);
	} else {
		window.attachEvent('onresize', checkSize);
	}

})(window);</script>

<img src="/faviconso.ico" alt=""><a href="http://www.so.com/s?src=news_srp_rightside&amp;q=%E8%8B%B1%E9%9B%84%E8%81%94%E7%9B%9F" target="_blank">去网页搜索：<span style="color:#c00">英雄联盟</span></a>
</section>
<script>;(function(){
			setTimeout(function(){
				var side = document.getElementById('side'),
					target = findEle(side, 'to_haosou'),
					span = target && target.getElementsByTagName('span')[0],
					a = span && span.parentNode,
					href = a.href;
				a.href = href.replace(/src=.*&/,'src=news_srp_rightside&');
				span && (span.innerHTML = cutStr(span.innerHTML, 16, '...'));
			},100);

			function findEle(ele, className){
				var children = ele && ele.children,
					len = children && children.length - 1,
					ele = null;
				while(len >= 0){
					ele = children[len--];ele.className;
					if(ele.className == className){
						return ele;
					}
				}
			}
			function cutStr(str, max, instead){
				var i = 0,
					len = 0,
					num = 0;
				str = str.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,'');
				for(len = str.length; i < len;){
					str.charCodeAt(i++) < 128 ? num += 1 : num += 2;
					if(num > max){
						return str.substring(0, i) + instead;
					}
				}
				return str;
			}
	})();</script>

<div id="container">
<script>(function(window){
	var evCache = {};
	window.So = {
		'comm': {
			'wide': false
		}
	};
	window.PageLine = {
		on: function(ev, callback) {
			if (ev && callback && typeof ev === 'string' && typeof callback === 'function') {
				if (!evCache[ev]) {
					evCache[ev] = [];
				}
				evCache[ev].push(callback);
			}
		},
		trigger: function(ev) {
			if (ev && typeof ev === 'string' && evCache[ev]) {
				for (var i = evCache[ev].length; i--;) {
					evCache[ev][i]();
				}
			}
		}
	};

	var documentELement = document.documentElement,
	wrap = document.getElementById("warper"),
	setClass = function() {
		if (documentELement.clientWidth > 1140) {
			So.comm.wide = true;
			wrap.className.indexOf("so-w1330") < 0 && (wrap.className += " so-w1330");
		} else {
			So.comm.wide = false;
			wrap.className = wrap.className.replace("so-w1330", "");
		}
		window.PageLine.trigger('resize');
	},
	timer,
	checkSize = function() {
		timer && clearTimeout(timer);
		timer = setTimeout(function() {
			setClass();
		}, 100);
	};
	setClass();
	if (window.addEventListener) {
		window.addEventListener('resize', checkSize);
	} else {
		window.attachEvent('onresize', checkSize);
	}

})(window);</script>

<img src="/faviconso.ico" alt=""><a href="http://www.so.com/s?src=news_srp_rightside&amp;q=%E8%8B%B1%E9%9B%84%E8%81%94%E7%9B%9F" target="_blank">去网页搜索：<span style="color:#c00">英雄联盟</span></a>

<script>;(function(){
			setTimeout(function(){
				var side = document.getElementById('side'),
					target = findEle(side, 'to_haosou'),
					span = target && target.getElementsByTagName('span')[0],
					a = span && span.parentNode,
					href = a.href;
				a.href = href.replace(/src=.*&/,'src=news_srp_rightside&');
				span && (span.innerHTML = cutStr(span.innerHTML, 16, '...'));
			},100);

			function findEle(ele, className){
				var children = ele && ele.children,
					len = children && children.length - 1,
					ele = null;
				while(len >= 0){
					ele = children[len--];ele.className;
					if(ele.className == className){
						return ele;
					}
				}
			}
			function cutStr(str, max, instead){
				var i = 0,
					len = 0,
					num = 0;
				str = str.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,'');
				for(len = str.length; i < len;){
					str.charCodeAt(i++) < 128 ? num += 1 : num += 2;
					if(num > max){
						return str.substring(0, i) + instead;
					}
				}
				return str;
			}
	})();</script>

<div id="container">
<script>(function(window){
	var evCache = {};
	window.So = {
		'comm': {
			'wide': false
		}
	};
	window.PageLine = {
		on: function(ev, callback) {
			if (ev && callback && typeof ev === 'string' && typeof callback === 'function') {
				if (!evCache[ev]) {
					evCache[ev] = [];
				}
				evCache[ev].push(callback);
			}
		},
		trigger: function(ev) {
			if (ev && typeof ev === 'string' && evCache[ev]) {
				for (var i = evCache[ev].length; i--;) {
					evCache[ev][i]();
				}
			}
		}
	};

	var documentELement = document.documentElement,
	wrap = document.getElementById("warper"),
	setClass = function() {
		if (documentELement.clientWidth > 1140) {
			So.comm.wide = true;
			wrap.className.indexOf("so-w1330") < 0 && (wrap.className += " so-w1330");
		} else {
			So.comm.wide = false;
			wrap.className = wrap.className.replace("so-w1330", "");
		}
		window.PageLine.trigger('resize');
	},
	timer,
	checkSize = function() {
		timer && clearTimeout(timer);
		timer = setTimeout(function() {
			setClass();
		}, 100);
	};
	setClass();
	if (window.addEventListener) {
		window.addEventListener('resize', checkSize);
	} else {
		window.attachEvent('onresize', checkSize);
	}

})(window);</script>

<script>;(function(){
			setTimeout(function(){
				var side = document.getElementById('side'),
					target = findEle(side, 'to_haosou'),
					span = target && target.getElementsByTagName('span')[0],
					a = span && span.parentNode,
					href = a.href;
				a.href = href.replace(/src=.*&/,'src=news_srp_rightside&');
				span && (span.innerHTML = cutStr(span.innerHTML, 16, '...'));
			},100);

			function findEle(ele, className){
				var children = ele && ele.children,
					len = children && children.length - 1,
					ele = null;
				while(len >= 0){
					ele = children[len--];ele.className;
					if(ele.className == className){
						return ele;
					}
				}
			}
			function cutStr(str, max, instead){
				var i = 0,
					len = 0,
					num = 0;
				str = str.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,'');
				for(len = str.length; i < len;){
					str.charCodeAt(i++) < 128 ? num += 1 : num += 2;
					if(num > max){
						return str.substring(0, i) + instead;
					}
				}
				return str;
			}
	})();</script>

<script>(function(window){
	var evCache = {};
	window.So = {
		'comm': {
			'wide': false
		}
	};
	window.PageLine = {
		on: function(ev, callback) {
			if (ev && callback && typeof ev === 'string' && typeof callback === 'function') {
				if (!evCache[ev]) {
					evCache[ev] = [];
				}
				evCache[ev].push(callback);
			}
		},
		trigger: function(ev) {
			if (ev && typeof ev === 'string' && evCache[ev]) {
				for (var i = evCache[ev].length; i--;) {
					evCache[ev][i]();
				}
			}
		}
	};

	var documentELement = document.documentElement,
	wrap = document.getElementById("warper"),
	setClass = function() {
		if (documentELement.clientWidth > 1140) {
			So.comm.wide = true;
			wrap.className.indexOf("so-w1330") < 0 && (wrap.className += " so-w1330");
		} else {
			So.comm.wide = false;
			wrap.className = wrap.className.replace("so-w1330", "");
		}
		window.PageLine.trigger('resize');
	},
	timer,
	checkSize = function() {
		timer && clearTimeout(timer);
		timer = setTimeout(function() {
			setClass();
		}, 100);
	};
	setClass();
	if (window.addEventListener) {
		window.addEventListener('resize', checkSize);
	} else {
		window.attachEvent('onresize', checkSize);
	}

})(window);</script>

<script>;(function(){
			setTimeout(function(){
				var side = document.getElementById('side'),
					target = findEle(side, 'to_haosou'),
					span = target && target.getElementsByTagName('span')[0],
					a = span && span.parentNode,
					href = a.href;
				a.href = href.replace(/src=.*&/,'src=news_srp_rightside&');
				span && (span.innerHTML = cutStr(span.innerHTML, 16, '...'));
			},100);

			function findEle(ele, className){
				var children = ele && ele.children,
					len = children && children.length - 1,
					ele = null;
				while(len >= 0){
					ele = children[len--];ele.className;
					if(ele.className == className){
						return ele;
					}
				}
			}
			function cutStr(str, max, instead){
				var i = 0,
					len = 0,
					num = 0;
				str = str.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,'');
				for(len = str.length; i < len;){
					str.charCodeAt(i++) < 128 ? num += 1 : num += 2;
					if(num > max){
						return str.substring(0, i) + instead;
					}
				}
				return str;
			}
	})();</script>

<script>(function(window){
	var evCache = {};
	window.So = {
		'comm': {
			'wide': false
		}
	};
	window.PageLine = {
		on: function(ev, callback) {
			if (ev && callback && typeof ev === 'string' && typeof callback === 'function') {
				if (!evCache[ev]) {
					evCache[ev] = [];
				}
				evCache[ev].push(callback);
			}
		},
		trigger: function(ev) {
			if (ev && typeof ev === 'string' && evCache[ev]) {
				for (var i = evCache[ev].length; i--;) {
					evCache[ev][i]();
				}
			}
		}
	};

	var documentELement = document.documentElement,
	wrap = document.getElementById("warper"),
	setClass = function() {
		if (documentELement.clientWidth > 1140) {
			So.comm.wide = true;
			wrap.className.indexOf("so-w1330") < 0 && (wrap.className += " so-w1330");
		} else {
			So.comm.wide = false;
			wrap.className = wrap.className.replace("so-w1330", "");
		}
		window.PageLine.trigger('resize');
	},
	timer,
	checkSize = function() {
		timer && clearTimeout(timer);
		timer = setTimeout(function() {
			setClass();
		}, 100);
	};
	setClass();
	if (window.addEventListener) {
		window.addEventListener('resize', checkSize);
	} else {
		window.attachEvent('onresize', checkSize);
	}

})(window);</script>

<script>;(function(){
			setTimeout(function(){
				var side = document.getElementById('side'),
					target = findEle(side, 'to_haosou'),
					span = target && target.getElementsByTagName('span')[0],
					a = span && span.parentNode,
					href = a.href;
				a.href = href.replace(/src=.*&/,'src=news_srp_rightside&');
				span && (span.innerHTML = cutStr(span.innerHTML, 16, '...'));
			},100);

			function findEle(ele, className){
				var children = ele && ele.children,
					len = children && children.length - 1,
					ele = null;
				while(len >= 0){
					ele = children[len--];ele.className;
					if(ele.className == className){
						return ele;
					}
				}
			}
			function cutStr(str, max, instead){
				var i = 0,
					len = 0,
					num = 0;
				str = str.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,'');
				for(len = str.length; i < len;){
					str.charCodeAt(i++) < 128 ? num += 1 : num += 2;
					if(num > max){
						return str.substring(0, i) + instead;
					}
				}
				return str;
			}
	})();</script>

<div id="container">
<script>(function(window){
	var evCache = {};
	window.So = {
		'comm': {
			'wide': false
		}
	};
	window.PageLine = {
		on: function(ev, callback) {
			if (ev && callback && typeof ev === 'string' && typeof callback === 'function') {
				if (!evCache[ev]) {
					evCache[ev] = [];
				}
				evCache[ev].push(callback);
			}
		},
		trigger: function(ev) {
			if (ev && typeof ev === 'string' && evCache[ev]) {
				for (var i = evCache[ev].length; i--;) {
					evCache[ev][i]();
				}
			}
		}
	};

	var documentELement = document.documentElement,
	wrap = document.getElementById("warper"),
	setClass = function() {
		if (documentELement.clientWidth > 1140) {
			So.comm.wide = true;
			wrap.className.indexOf("so-w1330") < 0 && (wrap.className += " so-w1330");
		} else {
			So.comm.wide = false;
			wrap.className = wrap.className.replace("so-w1330", "");
		}
		window.PageLine.trigger('resize');
	},
	timer,
	checkSize = function() {
		timer && clearTimeout(timer);
		timer = setTimeout(function() {
			setClass();
		}, 100);
	};
	setClass();
	if (window.addEventListener) {
		window.addEventListener('resize', checkSize);
	} else {
		window.attachEvent('onresize', checkSize);
	}

})(window);</script>

<script>;(function(){
			setTimeout(function(){
				var side = document.getElementById('side'),
					target = findEle(side, 'to_haosou'),
					span = target && target.getElementsByTagName('span')[0],
					a = span && span.parentNode,
					href = a.href;
				a.href = href.replace(/src=.*&/,'src=news_srp_rightside&');
				span && (span.innerHTML = cutStr(span.innerHTML, 16, '...'));
			},100);

			function findEle(ele, className){
				var children = ele && ele.children,
					len = children && children.length - 1,
					ele = null;
				while(len >= 0){
					ele = children[len--];ele.className;
					if(ele.className == className){
						return ele;
					}
				}
			}
			function cutStr(str, max, instead){
				var i = 0,
					len = 0,
					num = 0;
				str = str.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,'');
				for(len = str.length; i < len;){
					str.charCodeAt(i++) < 128 ? num += 1 : num += 2;
					if(num > max){
						return str.substring(0, i) + instead;
					}
				}
				return str;
			}
	})();</script>

<script>(function(window){
	var evCache = {};
	window.So = {
		'comm': {
			'wide': false
		}
	};
	window.PageLine = {
		on: function(ev, callback) {
			if (ev && callback && typeof ev === 'string' && typeof callback === 'function') {
				if (!evCache[ev]) {
					evCache[ev] = [];
				}
				evCache[ev].push(callback);
			}
		},
		trigger: function(ev) {
			if (ev && typeof ev === 'string' && evCache[ev]) {
				for (var i = evCache[ev].length; i--;) {
					evCache[ev][i]();
				}
			}
		}
	};

	var documentELement = document.documentElement,
	wrap = document.getElementById("warper"),
	setClass = function() {
		if (documentELement.clientWidth > 1140) {
			So.comm.wide = true;
			wrap.className.indexOf("so-w1330") < 0 && (wrap.className += " so-w1330");
		} else {
			So.comm.wide = false;
			wrap.className = wrap.className.replace("so-w1330", "");
		}
		window.PageLine.trigger('resize');
	},
	timer,
	checkSize = function() {
		timer && clearTimeout(timer);
		timer = setTimeout(function() {
			setClass();
		}, 100);
	};
	setClass();
	if (window.addEventListener) {
		window.addEventListener('resize', checkSize);
	} else {
		window.attachEvent('onresize', checkSize);
	}

})(window);</script>

<script>;(function(){
			setTimeout(function(){
				var side = document.getElementById('side'),
					target = findEle(side, 'to_haosou'),
					span = target && target.getElementsByTagName('span')[0],
					a = span && span.parentNode,
					href = a.href;
				a.href = href.replace(/src=.*&/,'src=news_srp_rightside&');
				span && (span.innerHTML = cutStr(span.innerHTML, 16, '...'));
			},100);

			function findEle(ele, className){
				var children = ele && ele.children,
					len = children && children.length - 1,
					ele = null;
				while(len >= 0){
					ele = children[len--];ele.className;
					if(ele.className == className){
						return ele;
					}
				}
			}
			function cutStr(str, max, instead){
				var i = 0,
					len = 0,
					num = 0;
				str = str.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,'');
				for(len = str.length; i < len;){
					str.charCodeAt(i++) < 128 ? num += 1 : num += 2;
					if(num > max){
						return str.substring(0, i) + instead;
					}
				}
				return str;
			}
	})();</script>

<script>(function(window){
	var evCache = {};
	window.So = {
		'comm': {
			'wide': false
		}
	};
	window.PageLine = {
		on: function(ev, callback) {
			if (ev && callback && typeof ev === 'string' && typeof callback === 'function') {
				if (!evCache[ev]) {
					evCache[ev] = [];
				}
				evCache[ev].push(callback);
			}
		},
		trigger: function(ev) {
			if (ev && typeof ev === 'string' && evCache[ev]) {
				for (var i = evCache[ev].length; i--;) {
					evCache[ev][i]();
				}
			}
		}
	};

	var documentELement = document.documentElement,
	wrap = document.getElementById("warper"),
	setClass = function() {
		if (documentELement.clientWidth > 1140) {
			So.comm.wide = true;
			wrap.className.indexOf("so-w1330") < 0 && (wrap.className += " so-w1330");
		} else {
			So.comm.wide = false;
			wrap.className = wrap.className.replace("so-w1330", "");
		}
		window.PageLine.trigger('resize');
	},
	timer,
	checkSize = function() {
		timer && clearTimeout(timer);
		timer = setTimeout(function() {
			setClass();
		}, 100);
	};
	setClass();
	if (window.addEventListener) {
		window.addEventListener('resize', checkSize);
	} else {
		window.attachEvent('onresize', checkSize);
	}

})(window);</script>

<script>;(function(){
			setTimeout(function(){
				var side = document.getElementById('side'),
					target = findEle(side, 'to_haosou'),
					span = target && target.getElementsByTagName('span')[0],
					a = span && span.parentNode,
					href = a.href;
				a.href = href.replace(/src=.*&/,'src=news_srp_rightside&');
				span && (span.innerHTML = cutStr(span.innerHTML, 16, '...'));
			},100);

			function findEle(ele, className){
				var children = ele && ele.children,
					len = children && children.length - 1,
					ele = null;
				while(len >= 0){
					ele = children[len--];ele.className;
					if(ele.className == className){
						return ele;
					}
				}
			}
			function cutStr(str, max, instead){
				var i = 0,
					len = 0,
					num = 0;
				str = str.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,'');
				for(len = str.length; i < len;){
					str.charCodeAt(i++) < 128 ? num += 1 : num += 2;
					if(num > max){
						return str.substring(0, i) + instead;
					}
				}
				return str;
			}
	})();</script>

<script>(function(window){
	var evCache = {};
	window.So = {
		'comm': {
			'wide': false
		}
	};
	window.PageLine = {
		on: function(ev, callback) {
			if (ev && callback && typeof ev === 'string' && typeof callback === 'function') {
				if (!evCache[ev]) {
					evCache[ev] = [];
				}
				evCache[ev].push(callback);
			}
		},
		trigger: function(ev) {
			if (ev && typeof ev === 'string' && evCache[ev]) {
				for (var i = evCache[ev].length; i--;) {
					evCache[ev][i]();
				}
			}
		}
	};

	var documentELement = document.documentElement,
	wrap = document.getElementById("warper"),
	setClass = function() {
		if (documentELement.clientWidth > 1140) {
			So.comm.wide = true;
			wrap.className.indexOf("so-w1330") < 0 && (wrap.className += " so-w1330");
		} else {
			So.comm.wide = false;
			wrap.className = wrap.className.replace("so-w1330", "");
		}
		window.PageLine.trigger('resize');
	},
	timer,
	checkSize = function() {
		timer && clearTimeout(timer);
		timer = setTimeout(function() {
			setClass();
		}, 100);
	};
	setClass();
	if (window.addEventListener) {
		window.addEventListener('resize', checkSize);
	} else {
		window.attachEvent('onresize', checkSize);
	}

})(window);</script>

<script>;(function(){
			setTimeout(function(){
				var side = document.getElementById('side'),
					target = findEle(side, 'to_haosou'),
					span = target && target.getElementsByTagName('span')[0],
					a = span && span.parentNode,
					href = a.href;
				a.href = href.replace(/src=.*&/,'src=news_srp_rightside&');
				span && (span.innerHTML = cutStr(span.innerHTML, 16, '...'));
			},100);

			function findEle(ele, className){
				var children = ele && ele.children,
					len = children && children.length - 1,
					ele = null;
				while(len >= 0){
					ele = children[len--];ele.className;
					if(ele.className == className){
						return ele;
					}
				}
			}
			function cutStr(str, max, instead){
				var i = 0,
					len = 0,
					num = 0;
				str = str.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,'');
				for(len = str.length; i < len;){
					str.charCodeAt(i++) < 128 ? num += 1 : num += 2;
					if(num > max){
						return str.substring(0, i) + instead;
					}
				}
				return str;
			}
	})();</script>

<div id="container">
<script>(function(window){
	var evCache = {};
	window.So = {
		'comm': {
			'wide': false
		}
	};
	window.PageLine = {
		on: function(ev, callback) {
			if (ev && callback && typeof ev === 'string' && typeof callback === 'function') {
				if (!evCache[ev]) {
					evCache[ev] = [];
				}
				evCache[ev].push(callback);
			}
		},
		trigger: function(ev) {
			if (ev && typeof ev === 'string' && evCache[ev]) {
				for (var i = evCache[ev].length; i--;) {
					evCache[ev][i]();
				}
			}
		}
	};

	var documentELement = document.documentElement,
	wrap = document.getElementById("warper"),
	setClass = function() {
		if (documentELement.clientWidth > 1140) {
			So.comm.wide = true;
			wrap.className.indexOf("so-w1330") < 0 && (wrap.className += " so-w1330");
		} else {
			So.comm.wide = false;
			wrap.className = wrap.className.replace("so-w1330", "");
		}
		window.PageLine.trigger('resize');
	},
	timer,
	checkSize = function() {
		timer && clearTimeout(timer);
		timer = setTimeout(function() {
			setClass();
		}, 100);
	};
	setClass();
	if (window.addEventListener) {
		window.addEventListener('resize', checkSize);
	} else {
		window.attachEvent('onresize', checkSize);
	}

})(window);</script>

<script>;(function(){
			setTimeout(function(){
				var side = document.getElementById('side'),
					target = findEle(side, 'to_haosou'),
					span = target && target.getElementsByTagName('span')[0],
					a = span && span.parentNode,
					href = a.href;
				a.href = href.replace(/src=.*&/,'src=news_srp_rightside&');
				span && (span.innerHTML = cutStr(span.innerHTML, 16, '...'));
			},100);

			function findEle(ele, className){
				var children = ele && ele.children,
					len = children && children.length - 1,
					ele = null;
				while(len >= 0){
					ele = children[len--];ele.className;
					if(ele.className == className){
						return ele;
					}
				}
			}
			function cutStr(str, max, instead){
				var i = 0,
					len = 0,
					num = 0;
				str = str.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,'');
				for(len = str.length; i < len;){
					str.charCodeAt(i++) < 128 ? num += 1 : num += 2;
					if(num > max){
						return str.substring(0, i) + instead;
					}
				}
				return str;
			}
	})();</script>

<script>_loader.use("jquery",function(){function f(){$(".mh-less",s).each(function(){var e=$(this),t=e.closest(".mh-box"),n=t.find(".mh-bd");e.removeClass("mh-less"),n.height(t.data("line").i*c())})}function l(){return So.comm.wide}function c(){return 114}var e="4",t="3",n="4",r=e*n,i=t*n,s=$("#mohe-know_side_nlp-imagelist"),o=$(".mh-box",s),u=null;try{$(".js-imglist-img",s).error(function(){$(this).attr("src","http://p8.qhimg.com/dmsmty/74_74_80/t0103d5b18ff1ad8d7e.png").unbind("error")})}catch(a){}window.PageLine&&PageLine.on&&(PageLine.on("resize",function(){if(u&&new Date*1-u<600)return;f(),$(".mh-box",s).each(function(e,t){var n=$(this),r=n.find(".mh-op-fold"),i=n.find(".mh-bd"),s=n.data("line"),o=s.i,u=l()?s.k:s.z,a=c();u>o?(r.show(),i.height(a*o)):(r.hide(),i.height(a*u))})}),PageLine.trigger("resize")),s.on("click",".mh-op-fold",function(e){e.preventDefault();var t=l();u=new Date*1;var s=$(this),o=s.closest(".mh-box"),a=o.find(".mh-bd"),h=o.data("line"),p=h.i,d=t?h.k:h.z,v=c();if(s.hasClass("mh-less"))a.height(d>p?p*v:v);else{f();var m=a.find(".js-imglist-img").not("[data-src]"),g=a.find(".js-imglist-img[data-src]"),y=t?r:i,b=y-m.length;b>0&&g.length&&g.each(function(e,t){if(e+1>b)return;var n=$(this);n.attr("src",n.data("src")).removeAttr("data-src")}),a.height(v*Math.min(d,n))}s.toggleClass("mh-less")}).on("click",".js-showall",function(t){s.find(".mh-box-hide").each(function(t,n){var r=$(n),i=r.data("line").i*e-1;r.find(".js-imglist-img").each(function(e,t){if(e>i)return;var n=$(this);n.attr("src",n.data("src")).removeAttr("data-src")}),r.removeClass("mh-box-hide")}),$(this).remove()});var h="0",p="3",d=[];for(var v=h;v<p;v++)d.push("tag"+v);var m=$.parseJSON($.trim($(".js-mh-versions",s).val()));window.PageLine&&PageLine.fill&&PageLine.fill({cat:"know_side_nlp-moni-imagelist","md-nlp-v":m.join("|"),"md-nlp-i":d.join("|")})})</script></div><script>window.PageLine&&PageLine.fill&&PageLine.fill({cat:"know_side_nlp-moni"})</script>

<script>(function(window){
	var evCache = {};
	window.So = {
		'comm': {
			'wide': false
		}
	};
	window.PageLine = {
		on: function(ev, callback) {
			if (ev && callback && typeof ev === 'string' && typeof callback === 'function') {
				if (!evCache[ev]) {
					evCache[ev] = [];
				}
				evCache[ev].push(callback);
			}
		},
		trigger: function(ev) {
			if (ev && typeof ev === 'string' && evCache[ev]) {
				for (var i = evCache[ev].length; i--;) {
					evCache[ev][i]();
				}
			}
		}
	};

	var documentELement = document.documentElement,
	wrap = document.getElementById("warper"),
	setClass = function() {
		if (documentELement.clientWidth > 1140) {
			So.comm.wide = true;
			wrap.className.indexOf("so-w1330") < 0 && (wrap.className += " so-w1330");
		} else {
			So.comm.wide = false;
			wrap.className = wrap.className.replace("so-w1330", "");
		}
		window.PageLine.trigger('resize');
	},
	timer,
	checkSize = function() {
		timer && clearTimeout(timer);
		timer = setTimeout(function() {
			setClass();
		}, 100);
	};
	setClass();
	if (window.addEventListener) {
		window.addEventListener('resize', checkSize);
	} else {
		window.attachEvent('onresize', checkSize);
	}

})(window);</script>

<img src="/faviconso.ico" alt=""><a href="http://www.so.com/s?src=news_srp_rightside&amp;q=%E6%8D%89%E5%A6%96%E8%AE%B0" target="_blank">去网页搜索：<span style="color:#c00">捉妖记</span></a>
</section>
<script>;(function(){
			setTimeout(function(){
				var side = document.getElementById('side'),
					target = findEle(side, 'to_haosou'),
					span = target && target.getElementsByTagName('span')[0],
					a = span && span.parentNode,
					href = a.href;
				a.href = href.replace(/src=.*&/,'src=news_srp_rightside&');
				span && (span.innerHTML = cutStr(span.innerHTML, 16, '...'));
			},100);

			function findEle(ele, className){
				var children = ele && ele.children,
					len = children && children.length - 1,
					ele = null;
				while(len >= 0){
					ele = children[len--];ele.className;
					if(ele.className == className){
						return ele;
					}
				}
			}
			function cutStr(str, max, instead){
				var i = 0,
					len = 0,
					num = 0;
				str = str.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,'');
				for(len = str.length; i < len;){
					str.charCodeAt(i++) < 128 ? num += 1 : num += 2;
					if(num > max){
						return str.substring(0, i) + instead;
					}
				}
				return str;
			}
	})();</script>

<script>(function(window){
	var evCache = {};
	window.So = {
		'comm': {
			'wide': false
		}
	};
	window.PageLine = {
		on: function(ev, callback) {
			if (ev && callback && typeof ev === 'string' && typeof callback === 'function') {
				if (!evCache[ev]) {
					evCache[ev] = [];
				}
				evCache[ev].push(callback);
			}
		},
		trigger: function(ev) {
			if (ev && typeof ev === 'string' && evCache[ev]) {
				for (var i = evCache[ev].length; i--;) {
					evCache[ev][i]();
				}
			}
		}
	};

	var documentELement = document.documentElement,
	wrap = document.getElementById("warper"),
	setClass = function() {
		if (documentELement.clientWidth > 1140) {
			So.comm.wide = true;
			wrap.className.indexOf("so-w1330") < 0 && (wrap.className += " so-w1330");
		} else {
			So.comm.wide = false;
			wrap.className = wrap.className.replace("so-w1330", "");
		}
		window.PageLine.trigger('resize');
	},
	timer,
	checkSize = function() {
		timer && clearTimeout(timer);
		timer = setTimeout(function() {
			setClass();
		}, 100);
	};
	setClass();
	if (window.addEventListener) {
		window.addEventListener('resize', checkSize);
	} else {
		window.attachEvent('onresize', checkSize);
	}

})(window);</script>

<script>;(function(){
			setTimeout(function(){
				var side = document.getElementById('side'),
					target = findEle(side, 'to_haosou'),
					span = target && target.getElementsByTagName('span')[0],
					a = span && span.parentNode,
					href = a.href;
				a.href = href.replace(/src=.*&/,'src=news_srp_rightside&');
				span && (span.innerHTML = cutStr(span.innerHTML, 16, '...'));
			},100);

			function findEle(ele, className){
				var children = ele && ele.children,
					len = children && children.length - 1,
					ele = null;
				while(len >= 0){
					ele = children[len--];ele.className;
					if(ele.className == className){
						return ele;
					}
				}
			}
			function cutStr(str, max, instead){
				var i = 0,
					len = 0,
					num = 0;
				str = str.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,'');
				for(len = str.length; i < len;){
					str.charCodeAt(i++) < 128 ? num += 1 : num += 2;
					if(num > max){
						return str.substring(0, i) + instead;
					}
				}
				return str;
			}
	})();</script>

<script>_loader.use("jquery",function(){function f(){$(".mh-less",s).each(function(){var e=$(this),t=e.closest(".mh-box"),n=t.find(".mh-bd");e.removeClass("mh-less"),n.height(t.data("line").i*c())})}function l(){return So.comm.wide}function c(){return 114}var e="4",t="3",n="4",r=e*n,i=t*n,s=$("#mohe-know_side_nlp-imagelist"),o=$(".mh-box",s),u=null;try{$(".js-imglist-img",s).error(function(){$(this).attr("src","http://p8.qhimg.com/dmsmty/74_74_80/t0103d5b18ff1ad8d7e.png").unbind("error")})}catch(a){}window.PageLine&&PageLine.on&&(PageLine.on("resize",function(){if(u&&new Date*1-u<600)return;f(),$(".mh-box",s).each(function(e,t){var n=$(this),r=n.find(".mh-op-fold"),i=n.find(".mh-bd"),s=n.data("line"),o=s.i,u=l()?s.k:s.z,a=c();u>o?(r.show(),i.height(a*o)):(r.hide(),i.height(a*u))})}),PageLine.trigger("resize")),s.on("click",".mh-op-fold",function(e){e.preventDefault();var t=l();u=new Date*1;var s=$(this),o=s.closest(".mh-box"),a=o.find(".mh-bd"),h=o.data("line"),p=h.i,d=t?h.k:h.z,v=c();if(s.hasClass("mh-less"))a.height(d>p?p*v:v);else{f();var m=a.find(".js-imglist-img").not("[data-src]"),g=a.find(".js-imglist-img[data-src]"),y=t?r:i,b=y-m.length;b>0&&g.length&&g.each(function(e,t){if(e+1>b)return;var n=$(this);n.attr("src",n.data("src")).removeAttr("data-src")}),a.height(v*Math.min(d,n))}s.toggleClass("mh-less")}).on("click",".js-showall",function(t){s.find(".mh-box-hide").each(function(t,n){var r=$(n),i=r.data("line").i*e-1;r.find(".js-imglist-img").each(function(e,t){if(e>i)return;var n=$(this);n.attr("src",n.data("src")).removeAttr("data-src")}),r.removeClass("mh-box-hide")}),$(this).remove()});var h="0",p="2",d=[];for(var v=h;v<p;v++)d.push("tag"+v);var m=$.parseJSON($.trim($(".js-mh-versions",s).val()));window.PageLine&&PageLine.fill&&PageLine.fill({cat:"know_side_nlp-moni-imagelist","md-nlp-v":m.join("|"),"md-nlp-i":d.join("|")})})</script></div><script>window.PageLine&&PageLine.fill&&PageLine.fill({cat:"know_side_nlp-moni"})</script>

<script>(function(window){
	var evCache = {};
	window.So = {
		'comm': {
			'wide': false
		}
	};
	window.PageLine = {
		on: function(ev, callback) {
			if (ev && callback && typeof ev === 'string' && typeof callback === 'function') {
				if (!evCache[ev]) {
					evCache[ev] = [];
				}
				evCache[ev].push(callback);
			}
		},
		trigger: function(ev) {
			if (ev && typeof ev === 'string' && evCache[ev]) {
				for (var i = evCache[ev].length; i--;) {
					evCache[ev][i]();
				}
			}
		}
	};

	var documentELement = document.documentElement,
	wrap = document.getElementById("warper"),
	setClass = function() {
		if (documentELement.clientWidth > 1140) {
			So.comm.wide = true;
			wrap.className.indexOf("so-w1330") < 0 && (wrap.className += " so-w1330");
		} else {
			So.comm.wide = false;
			wrap.className = wrap.className.replace("so-w1330", "");
		}
		window.PageLine.trigger('resize');
	},
	timer,
	checkSize = function() {
		timer && clearTimeout(timer);
		timer = setTimeout(function() {
			setClass();
		}, 100);
	};
	setClass();
	if (window.addEventListener) {
		window.addEventListener('resize', checkSize);
	} else {
		window.attachEvent('onresize', checkSize);
	}

})(window);</script>

<script>;(function(){
			setTimeout(function(){
				var side = document.getElementById('side'),
					target = findEle(side, 'to_haosou'),
					span = target && target.getElementsByTagName('span')[0],
					a = span && span.parentNode,
					href = a.href;
				a.href = href.replace(/src=.*&/,'src=news_srp_rightside&');
				span && (span.innerHTML = cutStr(span.innerHTML, 16, '...'));
			},100);

			function findEle(ele, className){
				var children = ele && ele.children,
					len = children && children.length - 1,
					ele = null;
				while(len >= 0){
					ele = children[len--];ele.className;
					if(ele.className == className){
						return ele;
					}
				}
			}
			function cutStr(str, max, instead){
				var i = 0,
					len = 0,
					num = 0;
				str = str.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,'');
				for(len = str.length; i < len;){
					str.charCodeAt(i++) < 128 ? num += 1 : num += 2;
					if(num > max){
						return str.substring(0, i) + instead;
					}
				}
				return str;
			}
	})();</script>

<script>(function(window){
	var evCache = {};
	window.So = {
		'comm': {
			'wide': false
		}
	};
	window.PageLine = {
		on: function(ev, callback) {
			if (ev && callback && typeof ev === 'string' && typeof callback === 'function') {
				if (!evCache[ev]) {
					evCache[ev] = [];
				}
				evCache[ev].push(callback);
			}
		},
		trigger: function(ev) {
			if (ev && typeof ev === 'string' && evCache[ev]) {
				for (var i = evCache[ev].length; i--;) {
					evCache[ev][i]();
				}
			}
		}
	};

	var documentELement = document.documentElement,
	wrap = document.getElementById("warper"),
	setClass = function() {
		if (documentELement.clientWidth > 1140) {
			So.comm.wide = true;
			wrap.className.indexOf("so-w1330") < 0 && (wrap.className += " so-w1330");
		} else {
			So.comm.wide = false;
			wrap.className = wrap.className.replace("so-w1330", "");
		}
		window.PageLine.trigger('resize');
	},
	timer,
	checkSize = function() {
		timer && clearTimeout(timer);
		timer = setTimeout(function() {
			setClass();
		}, 100);
	};
	setClass();
	if (window.addEventListener) {
		window.addEventListener('resize', checkSize);
	} else {
		window.attachEvent('onresize', checkSize);
	}

})(window);</script>

<script>;(function(){
			setTimeout(function(){
				var side = document.getElementById('side'),
					target = findEle(side, 'to_haosou'),
					span = target && target.getElementsByTagName('span')[0],
					a = span && span.parentNode,
					href = a.href;
				a.href = href.replace(/src=.*&/,'src=news_srp_rightside&');
				span && (span.innerHTML = cutStr(span.innerHTML, 16, '...'));
			},100);

			function findEle(ele, className){
				var children = ele && ele.children,
					len = children && children.length - 1,
					ele = null;
				while(len >= 0){
					ele = children[len--];ele.className;
					if(ele.className == className){
						return ele;
					}
				}
			}
			function cutStr(str, max, instead){
				var i = 0,
					len = 0,
					num = 0;
				str = str.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,'');
				for(len = str.length; i < len;){
					str.charCodeAt(i++) < 128 ? num += 1 : num += 2;
					if(num > max){
						return str.substring(0, i) + instead;
					}
				}
				return str;
			}
	})();</script>

<script>(function(window){
	var evCache = {};
	window.So = {
		'comm': {
			'wide': false
		}
	};
	window.PageLine = {
		on: function(ev, callback) {
			if (ev && callback && typeof ev === 'string' && typeof callback === 'function') {
				if (!evCache[ev]) {
					evCache[ev] = [];
				}
				evCache[ev].push(callback);
			}
		},
		trigger: function(ev) {
			if (ev && typeof ev === 'string' && evCache[ev]) {
				for (var i = evCache[ev].length; i--;) {
					evCache[ev][i]();
				}
			}
		}
	};

	var documentELement = document.documentElement,
	wrap = document.getElementById("warper"),
	setClass = function() {
		if (documentELement.clientWidth > 1140) {
			So.comm.wide = true;
			wrap.className.indexOf("so-w1330") < 0 && (wrap.className += " so-w1330");
		} else {
			So.comm.wide = false;
			wrap.className = wrap.className.replace("so-w1330", "");
		}
		window.PageLine.trigger('resize');
	},
	timer,
	checkSize = function() {
		timer && clearTimeout(timer);
		timer = setTimeout(function() {
			setClass();
		}, 100);
	};
	setClass();
	if (window.addEventListener) {
		window.addEventListener('resize', checkSize);
	} else {
		window.attachEvent('onresize', checkSize);
	}

})(window);</script>

<script>;(function(){
			setTimeout(function(){
				var side = document.getElementById('side'),
					target = findEle(side, 'to_haosou'),
					span = target && target.getElementsByTagName('span')[0],
					a = span && span.parentNode,
					href = a.href;
				a.href = href.replace(/src=.*&/,'src=news_srp_rightside&');
				span && (span.innerHTML = cutStr(span.innerHTML, 16, '...'));
			},100);

			function findEle(ele, className){
				var children = ele && ele.children,
					len = children && children.length - 1,
					ele = null;
				while(len >= 0){
					ele = children[len--];ele.className;
					if(ele.className == className){
						return ele;
					}
				}
			}
			function cutStr(str, max, instead){
				var i = 0,
					len = 0,
					num = 0;
				str = str.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,'');
				for(len = str.length; i < len;){
					str.charCodeAt(i++) < 128 ? num += 1 : num += 2;
					if(num > max){
						return str.substring(0, i) + instead;
					}
				}
				return str;
			}
	})();</script>

<script>(function(window){
	var evCache = {};
	window.So = {
		'comm': {
			'wide': false
		}
	};
	window.PageLine = {
		on: function(ev, callback) {
			if (ev && callback && typeof ev === 'string' && typeof callback === 'function') {
				if (!evCache[ev]) {
					evCache[ev] = [];
				}
				evCache[ev].push(callback);
			}
		},
		trigger: function(ev) {
			if (ev && typeof ev === 'string' && evCache[ev]) {
				for (var i = evCache[ev].length; i--;) {
					evCache[ev][i]();
				}
			}
		}
	};

	var documentELement = document.documentElement,
	wrap = document.getElementById("warper"),
	setClass = function() {
		if (documentELement.clientWidth > 1140) {
			So.comm.wide = true;
			wrap.className.indexOf("so-w1330") < 0 && (wrap.className += " so-w1330");
		} else {
			So.comm.wide = false;
			wrap.className = wrap.className.replace("so-w1330", "");
		}
		window.PageLine.trigger('resize');
	},
	timer,
	checkSize = function() {
		timer && clearTimeout(timer);
		timer = setTimeout(function() {
			setClass();
		}, 100);
	};
	setClass();
	if (window.addEventListener) {
		window.addEventListener('resize', checkSize);
	} else {
		window.attachEvent('onresize', checkSize);
	}

})(window);</script>

<script>;(function(){
			setTimeout(function(){
				var side = document.getElementById('side'),
					target = findEle(side, 'to_haosou'),
					span = target && target.getElementsByTagName('span')[0],
					a = span && span.parentNode,
					href = a.href;
				a.href = href.replace(/src=.*&/,'src=news_srp_rightside&');
				span && (span.innerHTML = cutStr(span.innerHTML, 16, '...'));
			},100);

			function findEle(ele, className){
				var children = ele && ele.children,
					len = children && children.length - 1,
					ele = null;
				while(len >= 0){
					ele = children[len--];ele.className;
					if(ele.className == className){
						return ele;
					}
				}
			}
			function cutStr(str, max, instead){
				var i = 0,
					len = 0,
					num = 0;
				str = str.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,'');
				for(len = str.length; i < len;){
					str.charCodeAt(i++) < 128 ? num += 1 : num += 2;
					if(num > max){
						return str.substring(0, i) + instead;
					}
				}
				return str;
			}
	})();</script>

<script>(function(window){
	var evCache = {};
	window.So = {
		'comm': {
			'wide': false
		}
	};
	window.PageLine = {
		on: function(ev, callback) {
			if (ev && callback && typeof ev === 'string' && typeof callback === 'function') {
				if (!evCache[ev]) {
					evCache[ev] = [];
				}
				evCache[ev].push(callback);
			}
		},
		trigger: function(ev) {
			if (ev && typeof ev === 'string' && evCache[ev]) {
				for (var i = evCache[ev].length; i--;) {
					evCache[ev][i]();
				}
			}
		}
	};

	var documentELement = document.documentElement,
	wrap = document.getElementById("warper"),
	setClass = function() {
		if (documentELement.clientWidth > 1140) {
			So.comm.wide = true;
			wrap.className.indexOf("so-w1330") < 0 && (wrap.className += " so-w1330");
		} else {
			So.comm.wide = false;
			wrap.className = wrap.className.replace("so-w1330", "");
		}
		window.PageLine.trigger('resize');
	},
	timer,
	checkSize = function() {
		timer && clearTimeout(timer);
		timer = setTimeout(function() {
			setClass();
		}, 100);
	};
	setClass();
	if (window.addEventListener) {
		window.addEventListener('resize', checkSize);
	} else {
		window.attachEvent('onresize', checkSize);
	}

})(window);</script>

<script>;(function(){
			setTimeout(function(){
				var side = document.getElementById('side'),
					target = findEle(side, 'to_haosou'),
					span = target && target.getElementsByTagName('span')[0],
					a = span && span.parentNode,
					href = a.href;
				a.href = href.replace(/src=.*&/,'src=news_srp_rightside&');
				span && (span.innerHTML = cutStr(span.innerHTML, 16, '...'));
			},100);

			function findEle(ele, className){
				var children = ele && ele.children,
					len = children && children.length - 1,
					ele = null;
				while(len >= 0){
					ele = children[len--];ele.className;
					if(ele.className == className){
						return ele;
					}
				}
			}
			function cutStr(str, max, instead){
				var i = 0,
					len = 0,
					num = 0;
				str = str.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,'');
				for(len = str.length; i < len;){
					str.charCodeAt(i++) < 128 ? num += 1 : num += 2;
					if(num > max){
						return str.substring(0, i) + instead;
					}
				}
				return str;
			}
	})();</script>

<script>(function(window){
	var evCache = {};
	window.So = {
		'comm': {
			'wide': false
		}
	};
	window.PageLine = {
		on: function(ev, callback) {
			if (ev && callback && typeof ev === 'string' && typeof callback === 'function') {
				if (!evCache[ev]) {
					evCache[ev] = [];
				}
				evCache[ev].push(callback);
			}
		},
		trigger: function(ev) {
			if (ev && typeof ev === 'string' && evCache[ev]) {
				for (var i = evCache[ev].length; i--;) {
					evCache[ev][i]();
				}
			}
		}
	};

	var documentELement = document.documentElement,
	wrap = document.getElementById("warper"),
	setClass = function() {
		if (documentELement.clientWidth > 1140) {
			So.comm.wide = true;
			wrap.className.indexOf("so-w1330") < 0 && (wrap.className += " so-w1330");
		} else {
			So.comm.wide = false;
			wrap.className = wrap.className.replace("so-w1330", "");
		}
		window.PageLine.trigger('resize');
	},
	timer,
	checkSize = function() {
		timer && clearTimeout(timer);
		timer = setTimeout(function() {
			setClass();
		}, 100);
	};
	setClass();
	if (window.addEventListener) {
		window.addEventListener('resize', checkSize);
	} else {
		window.attachEvent('onresize', checkSize);
	}

})(window);</script>

<script>;(function(){
			setTimeout(function(){
				var side = document.getElementById('side'),
					target = findEle(side, 'to_haosou'),
					span = target && target.getElementsByTagName('span')[0],
					a = span && span.parentNode,
					href = a.href;
				a.href = href.replace(/src=.*&/,'src=news_srp_rightside&');
				span && (span.innerHTML = cutStr(span.innerHTML, 16, '...'));
			},100);

			function findEle(ele, className){
				var children = ele && ele.children,
					len = children && children.length - 1,
					ele = null;
				while(len >= 0){
					ele = children[len--];ele.className;
					if(ele.className == className){
						return ele;
					}
				}
			}
			function cutStr(str, max, instead){
				var i = 0,
					len = 0,
					num = 0;
				str = str.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,'');
				for(len = str.length; i < len;){
					str.charCodeAt(i++) < 128 ? num += 1 : num += 2;
					if(num > max){
						return str.substring(0, i) + instead;
					}
				}
				return str;
			}
	})();</script>
